mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecommerce.utenti (codiceFiscale, password, nome, cognome, domicilio, email, telefono, dataNascita) VALUES (#{codiceFiscale, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nome, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cognome, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domicilio, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telefono, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataNascita, jdbcType=DATE})
